description: I'm a Canadian expat living in California and working at Blizzard Entertainment.
flickrDescription: My photo albums from various adventures, usually decent quality
instagramDescription: Random snaps from my daily life. Probably boring, but maybe not!
facebookDescription: Good way to keep in touch if you've ever met me in person
twitterDescription: I mostly tweet about random shit and beers that I drink
careerDescription: I'm passionate about all things JavaScript, interface development and user experience. Coming from a rather diverse background however, I tend to be well-rounded and can get things done with whatever gets thrown at me.
adventureDescription: My favourite outdoor activities are rock climbing, hiking and camping. I also ride a motorcycle pretty much all the time. Travelling is also a big thing, attempting to visit 100 countries in my lifetime.
gamingDescription: Everyone has something that pulls them away from the noise of life, for me it's video games. I have a particular fondness of completing goals and tracking my progress in games, which lead to some fun stat aggregation.
